evidence.claim: Abbott utilizes AWS cloud services for its diagnostics solutions.
The platform supports HL7 and FHIR standards for health data interoperability.
Abbott integrates with healthcare systems using EDI X12 for seamless transactions.
Kafka is mentioned as part of the infrastructure for handling data streams.

icp.icp_reason: Provides cloud-based lab diagnostics likely needing X12 transactions for claims and eligibility.
